text: Riotorto is a town in Tuscany, central Italy, administratively a frazione of the comune of Piombino, province of Livorno. At the time of the 2011 census its population was . Riotorto is about 80 km from Livorno and 15 km from Piombino. == Bibliography == * Category:Frazioni of the Province of Livorno
title: Riotorto, Piombino
